cropFinishedStep.happyWithResult:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading asking for user satisfaction with the cropped image
**UI Location**: Profile → Avatar Selector → Cropping Modal → Crop Finished Step (page heading)
**When Users See This**: After cropping an image for their avatar
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Happy with the result?"
cropFinishedStep.recrop:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to redo the cropping process
**UI Location**: Profile → Avatar Selector → Cropping Modal → Crop Finished Step (button)
**When Users See This**: After cropping an image, if they are not satisfied
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Recrop"
cropFinishedStep.saveImage:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to save the cropped image as the user's avatar
**UI Location**: Profile → Avatar Selector → Cropping Modal → Crop Finished Step (button)
**When Users See This**: After cropping an image, if they are satisfied
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Save image"
photo.yourProfilePicture:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the user's profile picture section
**UI Location**: Profile → Avatar Selector (section heading)
**When Users See This**: On the avatar selection page
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your profile picture"
photo.uploadNewImage:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to trigger uploading a new image for the profile picture
**UI Location**: Profile → Avatar Selector (button)
**When Users See This**: On the avatar selection page, when the user wants to change their avatar
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Upload new image"
photo.cropping:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational text about the cropping feature
**UI Location**: Profile → Avatar Selector (descriptive text)
**When Users See This**: On the avatar selection page, providing guidance before uploading
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You can crop the image after uploading."
